title: A Modern Comedy - statement about the statue

content.question: According to the passage, which statement about the statue is true?

choices.label: Its technical excellence initially prevented Soames from recognizing its power.
Its location leads Soames to see it as more somber than it might otherwise appear.
Its effect on Soames diminishes the longer he views it.
Its meaning to Soames varies with his angle of perspective.

content.answer: Its meaning to Soames varies with his angle of perspective.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
